title: Do THIS To Survive A Bonk!

media:group.media:title: Do THIS To Survive A Bonk!
media:group.media:description:
Bonking, hitting the wall, being knocked for 6, whatever you call it, running out of energy on a bike ride is horrible and can feel like the end of your ride entirely, but it doesn't have to be this way! Conor gives you some tips on how you can survive a bonk, and how you can avoid running out of energy in the future.

Chapters:
0:00 - Intro 
0:33 - Hydrate
1:33 - Eat More
2:28 - Slow down
3:11 - Tell Others
4:05 - It Can Get Better
4:51 - Stay Strong Mentally
5:43 - Skip The Beer
6:24 - Learn For Next Time
